title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Programmatically access AWS with your console credentials (SEC354)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用控制台凭证以编程方式访问AWS (SEC354)
abstract: Join us to learn about new capabilities that will enable you to use AWS services programmatically with your existing console credentials. You'll discover how to lower operational overhead while maintaining existing security practices through automatic management of temporary session-based credentials that fully enforce your organization's security controls. We will show how seamless integration across development tools enhances productivity by enabling fluid movement between CLI, SDKs, and local developer tools without learning different authentication processes. You will leave this session ready to implement a more streamlined, secure, and productive development workflow
abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解新功能，这些功能将使您能够使用现有的控制台凭证以编程方式使用AWS服务。您将了解如何通过自动管理临时会话凭证来降低运营开销，同时保持现有的安全实践，这些凭证完全执行您组织的安全控制。我们将展示开发工具之间的无缝集成如何通过在CLI、SDK和本地开发工具之间实现流畅切换来提高生产力，而无需学习不同的身份验证流程。您将在本次会议结束时准备好实施更加简化、安全和高效的开发工作流程。
